main.name: Manoj Kumar
main.occupation: Full Stack and Mobile App Developer
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Manoj! I've been coding for over 4+ years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. With this passion, I have now trained thousand's of developers across the globe. Through live coaching sessions on Youtube, I have accumulated several MILLION views demonstrating how to apply developer skills in a range of cool builds and challenges. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help students enter the world of web development. Youâ€™ll get hands-on experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world in this community.

work.title: Full Stack Developer and Mobile App Developer
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Manoj is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Manoj has been AWESOME, he makes our product so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
